name: Zeplin
headline: Deliver on the Promise of Design
description:
Zeplin is an organized workspace to publish finalized designs, where the entire team can collaborate to ship beautiful products together. We were founded in 2014 and today we are honored to support 5+ million users from thousands of product teams including Apple, Starbucks, Salesforce, Amazon, Microsoft, Audi and many more. We’re a Y Combinator startup, also backed by amazing investors like Elad Gil, Mike Maples, Kevin Hale. We’re a distributed crew with offices in San Francisco, Istanbul and London.

We're Hiring! Please apply directly on Zeplin's job site: https://zpl.io/jobs

###  Used by the leaders in design-first organizations 
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/bb7e65dc1c602148e7c76633fef5ce0dce075925-933x294.jpg?w=311&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/249fa578073e7eaf9ad8eda2f09fba5bdd4d5c89-2117x144.jpg?w=706&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/4daeef6677e924d9dd8e98a11e785aa619a5e7e0-2760x192.jpg?w=920&q=95)
## Why use Zeplin when I can manage handoff in my design tool?
Simple – because “handoff” in your design tool requires repeated file maintenance and extra clarification. That means more bloat and confusion.
[Compare Zeplin to Dev Mode ->](https://zeplin.io/</why-zeplin/dev-mode-alternative/>)
### Share designs once – for all
Spend more time creating — less time in files, meetings, and rework. Use a built-in-architecture made for delivering designs to development.
> “Zeplin gives us hierarchy and focus that's hard to maintain within design software.”
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/c0c0b9da27d3b52bbe0dc40fb8875f064c8d8165-60x26.svg)
### Control your budget and tools
Consolidating sounds good — until it turns costly and inflexible. Avoid lock-in and surprise paywalls while helping your team grow on your own terms.
> “Zeplin is flexible to every stage of growth, connecting work across current and legacy teams.”
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/c86dadefc4602556d4c86baee564f34ab87db423-83x26.svg)
### Meet your team where they are
Stop chasing info across modes and tools. Collaborate in a central hub that’s integrated with your tech stack of choice to keep all teams in sync.
Zeplin brings together work in:
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/e90d91ff877cfe26c96aca4d9bd683f1e84db2c9-864x72.png?w=288&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/b82461747d4d8f1f20018403997d00ebce61fdfe-610x180.png?w=203&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/f1086ee314a517c7815c3e74cce01d78fe86d045-894x72.png?w=298&q=95)

## Communicate intent
Document what to build and how designs should behave in a central, searchable, collaborative place for the entire product team.
### Separate ready-to-build from in‑progress
Publish completed designs to Zeplin's platform while you iterate on designs in your design tool.
![](https://cdn.zeplin.io/assets/landingPage/f9547ce0235c18deb488b763fd487a4156e44cbf-1296x734.gif)
### Manage changes
Track changes for each screen automatically – like Git for designs.
![](https://cdn.zeplin.io/assets/landingPage/591f5187b6edeb8c5d9fd18251148e0f08847d43-1824x948.gif)
### Organize in a standardized way
Make designs easy to find and understand for your entire product development team.
![](https://cdn.zeplin.io/assets/landingPage/6a7d0556cbcd676a5ed6f0b071b1b0809ba18ed0-1560x840.gif)
### Record in context
Display product requirements, user flows, and design behaviors on each screen.
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/7168e08d22d00be920e42f7ac8f71963c934e15f-1008x477.png?w=336&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/6edc4021da7125afae5ccd739e1caa67f1592d57-1008x684.png?w=336&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/2009737487f2cb3dea957dd4a3a7e72fc02daab8-1566x789.png?w=522&q=95)

Unite workflows across functions, lifecycles, and geographies – in a way your design tool can not.
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/cf849d2789adc0508489ccf9cf89654653b3d057-101x34.svg)

Tag specific team members to communicate the next steps and track the status of your designs.

## Develop efficiently
Accurately translate design to code — the first time.
### Connect to design systems
Surface design system information on every screen. Match design components with their codebase counterparts.
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/6ac26dcb6967a92e89ddde70170031fc24daee4a-864x504.png?w=288&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/65e7e78afecd6ed8581e781df118df10434ed5ad-864x684.png?w=288&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/20a60f5917b41511364cbeef0ff1d9f9cc40a102-1932x1152.gif?w=644&q=95)
### Integrate with developer-first workflow tools
Speed up dev cycles by syncing with tools you already use, like Slack, Teams, Jira, ADO, Storybook, and VS Code.
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/131db7fff0e976a4ba1fe2e3d850081865313561-864x270.png?w=288&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/d3dc7ef17ec693df504c255b49b855cbaca299ed-864x504.png?w=288&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/eadccef85eb3daf5502a280aa36e3ce7ccbb10c9-1560x865.png?w=520&q=95)
### Provide best-in-class development resources
Centralize designs and documentation. Automate manual front-end tasks and QA. Build excellent products at scale.
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/5e950959cb3a2b3338c10d391bfb2f9cbc21056a-864x504.png?w=288&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/8fa77c1a3c5b999191694fe28e05a856dffe501e-864x504.png?w=288&q=95) ![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/4312ba30b621d53adb60b112f3e10cd0af3a5914-1452x696.gif?w=484&q=95)

## Why use Zeplin when I can manage handoff in my design tool?
Simple – because “handoff” in your design tool requires repeated file maintenance and extra clarification. That means more bloat and confusion.
Compare Zeplin to Dev Mode ->⟨37⟩
### Share designs once – for all
Spend more time creating — less time in files, meetings, and rework. Use a built-in-architecture made for delivering designs to development.
> “Zeplin gives us hierarchy and focus that's hard to maintain within design software.”
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/c0c0b9da27d3b52bbe0dc40fb8875f064c8d8165-60x26.svg)
### Control your budget and tools
Consolidating sounds good — until it turns costly and inflexible. Avoid lock-in and surprise paywalls while helping your team grow on your own terms.
> “Zeplin is flexible to every stage of growth, connecting work across current and legacy teams.”
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/wd3e2pma/production/c86dadefc4602556d4c86baee564f34ab87db423-83x26.svg)
### Meet your team where they are
Stop chasing info across modes and tools. Collaborate in a central hub that’s integrated with your tech stack of choice to keep all teams in sync.
Zeplin brings together work in:

Zeplin is an innovative design delivery platform founded in 2015 as part of Y Combinator's S15 batch. Its mission is simple yet powerful: "Deliver on the Promise of Design." Based in San Francisco, with a distributed team of 140 employees across offices in Istanbul and London, Zeplin has revolutionized how product teams collaborate. Today, they empower over 5 million users, including prominent organizations like Apple, Starbucks, Amazon, Microsoft, and Audi.

### What Does Zeplin Do?

Zeplin simplifies the often cumbersome process of design handoff between designers and developers by creating a centralized workspace in which teams can collaborate efficiently. The platform supports three key functions:

1. **Document Designs**: It ensures that finalized designs are clearly communicated and accessible to all team members, reducing the chances of misinterpretation.
2. **Manage Workflows**: With features that allow for task assignments and feedback loops, Zeplin streamlines project management, making it easier for teams to work asynchronously across different functions.
3. **Scale Builds**: Zeplin integrates smoothly with design systems, ensuring accurate and efficient translation of designs into code, thus fostering a more efficient development process.

### The Products and Innovations

Zeplin includes two primary offerings:

- **Zeplin**: A design delivery platform focused on enhancing the designer-developer workflow.
- **Omlet**: A newer addition focusing on component analytics, aimed particularly at front-end developers, bridging the gap between design and code.

### Key Features:

- **Integrations**: Zeplin connects with popular tools like Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD as well as project management tools like Jira and Slack.
- **User-Focused Solutions**: Products tailored for different roles within a product team—designers, developers, and product managers—enhancing collaborative efficiency.
- **Transparent Pricing**: Starting at just $15 per month for unlimited users, it allows teams of all sizes to adopt the platform affordably.

### Corporate Culture and Values

Zeplin prides itself on fostering a collaborative, dynamic work environment. The company believes that design and development should work in harmony, and it provides the tools necessary for that alignment. They are actively hiring, indicating a growth mindset and a commitment to nurturing talent.

### Why Choose Zeplin?

Zeplin stands out by alleviating the complexities associated with handoffs in traditional design tools. The platform is built to help teams spend more time creating and less time in back-and-forths over design specifications. It provides clarity and focus, making it a favorite among teams aiming for seamless integration between design and development.

For those interested, you can explore their services or apply for job opportunities through [Zeplin's website](https://zeplin.io) or their [job portal](https://zpl.io/jobs). Whether you are a designer aiming for more efficient workflows or a developer needing a clearer path from design to implementation, Zeplin offers robust solutions tailored to meet your needs.
